page.title: 08CALLOOSE CARAVAN PARK CONT'D
page.content: At Calloose Caravan Park there are many facilities.There is a heated swimming_pool measuring 40 feet by 20 feet.The depth is 3 feet at the shallow end and 5'6" at the deepest end.There is also a paddling pool. Overlooking the swimming-pool are table-tennis facilities. The children's playground contains 2 see-saws,3 swings,1 climbing-frame with a built-in slide,another ordinary slide and a big tractor tyre which you can swing on.There is also a football goal. There is a children's room with arcade games and a pool table.Next door there is a licensed bar and lounge room with a snooker table.If you want to go into the bar you have to be 14 years old or over. None of these facilities are open to the public.
